actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to proclaim the second full week in May of each year as "National Art Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the second full week in May of each year as "National Art Week" and calls upon the people of the United States to observe such week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to proclaim the second full week in May of each year as "National Art Week."
